How can the developer create the page to enforce Field Level Security and keep future maintenance to a minimum?

discussion.content: With sharing keywords are used to configure sharing settings, not field settings. So in my opinion it should be A.

Selected Answer: A
Sharing has nothing to do with field level security so D is not correct.
Based on developer.salesforce.com/wiki/enforcing_crud_and_fls 
When rendering VisualForce pages, the platform will automatically enforce CRUD and FLS when the developer references SObjects and SObject fields directly in the VisualForce page. Therefore all that's needed is to create one visualforce component and it will automatically handle the field visibility
